title: Turn this guide into 100% win rate from iron iv 0 lp to bronze iv ?

embed.description: Iron4 #LeagueofLegends #IronIV Hello everyone! I decided to go into the deepest elo hell, and do "my own way" guides of how to exit the worst division in the world. There is text guide in the video as well, so make sure you pause the video to check it.

body: I would like to make myself a challenge, instead of making iron iv guides, i would try to win every match from iron iv 0 lp to bronze iv, that would be about 40 matches win streak, would someone be interested more in that ? :D
